channel.title: [317] adding objects(plz help)
channel.description:
i want to add an object..like a bank booth,etc.. i dont know how to do it... please help..
your gonna have to "spoon feed" me with this because i have no clue how to do it

item.title: [317] adding objects(plz help)
item.dc:creator: @noobsauce noobsauce
item.description:
@noobsauce wrote:

[quote=“Mod Franklin, post:6, topic:308648”]then just search for
public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null){
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)){
if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
if(person.heightLevel == 0){
person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}}}
public void NewObjects() { //~ here

Under That Add The MakeGlobalObject Code.[/quote]

nvm…
i found AddObject though…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2009, 06:38:51 pm[/size][hr]Im pretty sure its “AddGlobalObj” for my server

Read full topic

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null){
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)){
if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
if(person.heightLevel == 0){
person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}}}
public void NewObjects() { //~ here

Under That Add The MakeGlobalObject Code.

item.title: [317] adding objects(plz help)
item.dc:creator: @noobsauce noobsauce
item.description:
@noobsauce wrote:

[quote=“Mod Franklin, post:2, topic:308648”]Open Client.java
Search for
public void makeGlobalObject

under some of those codes of lines you should see a code similar to this.
makeGlobalObject(3345, 3714, 1005, -2, 10);

So Basically
makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, ID, -2, 10);

x= x position
y= y position
and the ID is the object.
add a new line like that and save compile.[/quote]

ermm…my client.java doesnt have makeglobalobject…

Read full topic

item.title: [317] adding objects(plz help)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Open Client.java
Search for
public void makeGlobalObject

under some of those codes of lines you should see a code similar to this.
makeGlobalObject(3345, 3714, 1005, -2, 10);

So Basically
makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, ID, -2, 10);

x= x position
y= y position
and the ID is the object.
add a new line like that and save compile.
